name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Analytics Engineer with 10+ years of experience in leveraging data transformation and visualization techniques. Proficient in **SQL**, **dbt**, **Data Vault**, and **dimensional modeling** to enhance data integrity and streamline the ELT process. Adept in **Git** for version control and collaborative project management within agile environments. Experienced in designing impactful dashboards and reports with tools like **Looker**, **Tableau Software**, **Qlik**, and **Power BI**. Familiar with **Snowflake** for data warehousing solutions. A self-starter and collaborative team player with excellent communication skills, fluent in French and English. Previously designed and delivered backend systems for top-tier organizations, showcasing strengths in API creation, automation tools, and scalable services using **Python** frameworks (FastAPI, Django, Flask) and cloud platforms such as **AWS** and **Azure**.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and optimized data workflows using **SQL** and **dbt** to enhance data accessibility and visualization for analytical processes.
• Implemented **Data Vault** techniques and **dimensional modelling** to structure data in a way that supports scalable analytics and reporting.
• Automated the **ELT process** to streamline data ingestion and transformation, ensuring faster availability for analytics.
• Utilized version control with **Git** to manage and track changes in data models and scripts efficiently.
• Created interactive dashboards and reports using **Tableau Software**, **Power BI**, and **Looker** to provide insights and drive business decisions.
• Conducted data analysis and visualization in the **Snowflake** environment to enable comprehensive reporting and analytics capabilities.
• Collaborated with business stakeholders in a **self-starter** and **collaborative team player** manner to address evolving analytics needs and challenges.
• Ensured effective communication and collaboration in an **agile environment**, contributing to project success and timely delivery of analytics solutions.
• Provided bi-lingual support (fluent in French and English) to communicate complex data insights to diverse stakeholders.

- Optimized data extraction and transformation by utilizing **SQL** and **dbt**, facilitating the ELT process to ensure accurate data reporting across platforms.
- Designed and implemented dimensional modelling strategies, enhancing data usability in reporting tools such as **Looker**, **Tableau Software**, and **Power BI** for visual analytics.
- Developed comprehensive data pipelines and storage solutions using **Snowflake**, ensuring timely and reliable access to data for end-users.
- Collaborated in an agile environment to deliver regular updates and enhancements, acting as a self-starter and a collaborative team player, achieving a **15%** reduction in delivery times.
- Established robust communication channels in both French and English, resulting in improved teamwork and understanding of project requirements, thereby enhancing productivity by **25%**.
- Contributed to maintaining and improving data governance protocols, utilizing techniques from the Data Vault methodology to ensure data integrity and compliance.

• Developed analytical models and optimized **SQL** queries to enhance the efficiency of portfolio management and account tracking, resulting in a **20%** improvement in query performance.
• Designed and implemented **dimensional modeling** strategies alongside **dbt** for improved data transformation processes, ensuring a robust ELT process within the environment.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to create dynamic data visualizations using **Tableau Software**, **Looker**, and **Power BI** that provided actionable insights for stakeholders.
• Streamlined data workflows on the **Snowflake** data platform, improving data accessibility and processing speed by **30%** in reporting tasks.
• Maintained version control effectively using **Git**, fostering a collaborative and efficient environment in an **agile system**.
• Spearheaded the integration of data from various sources into **Data Vault** structures, ensuring reliability and traceability of data sets.
• Communicated complex technical concepts effectively in both French and English, ensuring clear collaboration across diverse teams.
• Contributed as a **self-starter** and **collaborative team player**, taking initiative in problem-solving and enhancing team productivity.
